definition[0]: one of the four long thin parts on your hand, not including your thumb
example[0]: The woman had a ring on her finger, so I assumed she was married.
example[2]: She ran her fingers through his hair.
note[0]: run your fingers through/over/along etc something
definition[1]: the part of a glove that covers your finger
definition[2]: anything that is long and thin, like the shape of a finger, especially a piece of land, an area of water, or a piece of food
definition[3]: an amount of an alcoholic drink that is as high in the glass as the width of someoneâ€™s finger
definition[4]: to touch or handle something with your fingers
definition[5]: if someone, especially a criminal, fingers another criminal, they tell the police what that person has done
